page.title: 16CLEADON WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The main aim of the society is to live a fulfilled life, to meet people and take an interest in the environment by helping to solve problems. The President's ambition is to see all the problems in the village solved by the W.I. The main fear is that the committee might break up. It holds coffee mornings to raise money for charities such as{Cancer Research}so the charities would suffer if it did. The W.I. is involved with problems varying from{acid rain}to uneven paving stones in the local streets. A play area outside a local Inn has also been brought before the organisation. People are worried that young children may use this area as a regular meeting place,because of the possible influence of alcohol.
